description: Safari after 2.0 in Apple Mac OS X 10.3.9 allows remote attackers to bypass domain restrictions via crafted web archives that cause Safari to render them as if they came from a different site.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2524

description: Format string vulnerability in the ParseBannerAndCapability function in main.c for up-imapproxy 1.2.3 and 1.2.4 allows remote IMAP servers to execute arbitrary code via format string specifiers in a banner or capability line.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2661

description: The search_binary_handler function in exec.c in Linux 2.4 kernel on 64-bit x86 architectures does not check a return code for a particular function call when virtual memory is low, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (panic), as demonstrated by running a process using the bash ulimit -v command.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2708

description: Format string vulnerability in the Java user interface service (bpjava-msvc) daemon for VERITAS NetBackup Data and Business Center 4.5FP and 4.5MP, and NetBackup Enterprise/Server/Client 5.0, 5.1, and 6.0, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via the COMMAND_LOGON_TO_MSERVER command.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2715
